Emulating in qemu:
qemu-system-arm -cpu arm1176 -m 256 -M versatilepb -drive format=raw,file=os-x86_64.iso

http://paulscott.co.za/blog/full-raspberry-pi-raspbian-emulation-with-qemu/
http://linux-mitterteich.de/fileadmin/datafile/papers/2013/qemu_raspiemu_lug_18_sep_2013.pdf
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Mozilla/Developer_guide/Virtual_ARM_Linux_environment
https://www.archlinux.org/packages/?q=qemu
sudo pacman -S qemu-arch-extra
sudo pacman -S arm-none-eabi-binutils arm-none-eabi-gcc arm-none-eabi-gdb  arm-none-eabi-newlib

qemu-system-arm -M vexpress-a9 -cpu cortex-a9 -drive format=raw,file=os-x86_64.iso

pulseaudio: pa_context_connect() failed
pulseaudio: Reason: Connection refused
pulseaudio: Failed to initialize PA contextaudio: Could not init `pa' audio driver
Warning: Orphaned drive without device: id=scsi0-hd0,file=os-x86_64.iso,if=scsi,bus=0,unit=0
